_header: All christian people listen and hear
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 113.
_description: ‘Passio Sancti Erasmi’ — 172 lines in couplets (including a Prologue of 38 lines)

BodRawPoe34.First Lines:
All crystyn folk ye lestyn and hereoff a holy bysschop and a
                    martyre…
BodRawPoe34.Last Lines:
…To wich Ioye & blyss almyȝtty god bryng usThorgh
                    help of þis holy man seynt Erasmus

CULDd11.First Lines:
Alle cristen folk ȝe listen & lereOf an holy buschop &
                    a martereWhos name is clepid seynt Erasmus…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…to which ioye & blis good god bring vsÞorw help of
                    þis holy man seynt erasmus
CULDd11.Note:
‘Ne voceat spasmus michi me iuuet almus erasmus / O sacer
                        erasme meritis precibus quod regas me’ (as both heading and
                    colophon, ff. 295, 296v).
CULDd11.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu den Legenden.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         62 (1879): 397-442: 414-16.

BLAdd36983.First Lines:
All cristen folke ȝe listen And lereOf an holy buysshop &
                    a martere…
BLAdd36983.Last Lines:
…Þe name of þe fyrst was callid dioclicianAnd
                    þe seund was callid maximian
BLAdd36983.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Sammlung altenglischer Legenden.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1878: 201.

BLHar1671.First Lines:
Of synt herassimus here may A man redeWhat ioye he may haue and
                    what mede…
BLHar1671.Last Lines:
…that ys the blysse of heuene þat neuer schall endegod
                    yeue ous alle grace þedre to wende
BLHar1671.Note: Prologue only, beginning at line 5. Written as prose.

BLHar2382.First Lines:
All Cristen peple listeneth ye & hereOf an holi bisshop and a
                    martire…
BLHar2382.Last Lines:
…To which ioy and blisse good god bryng vsthurgh help of
                    þis holy man seynt Crasmus
BLHar2382.Note:
Scribe writes ‘amen’ below and to right of final
                    line; then these Latin verses: ‘Non noceat facmus / in me innet almus
                        Crasmus / O sacer Crasme / meritis precibusque regas me /
                    Explicit’ (f. 111).
BLHar2382.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Sammlung altenglischer Legenden.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1878: 198-200.

BLRoy8Cxii.First Lines:
Alle crystyn men lystent and hyreof an holy byschope & a
                    martyr…
BLRoy8Cxii.Last Lines:
…the blys that schall neuer shall endegod ȝeve vs grace
                    thedyr to wende
